name: quickdrop
tagline: A simple self-hosted app for fast file transfers
description: QuickDrop is a self-hosted file sharing app optimized for dropping large files across devices over local network or public access. It has a straightforward UI and supports drag-and-drop transfers.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Transfer files by dragging them into the browser window for instant sharing

features.title: Large File Support
features.description: Handle multi-gigabyte files without size restrictions or compression

features.title: Local Network Optimization
features.description: Transfer files at full LAN speeds between devices on the same network

features.title: Public Access Mode
features.description: Generate shareable links for external recipients to download files securely

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Start sharing files immediately without creating accounts or profiles

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Upload and download files from smartphones and tablets with a touch-optimized interface

features.title: Temporary Storage
features.description: Set automatic expiration times for shared files to manage disk space

features.title: Direct Downloads
features.description: Recipients download files directly without intermediate upload services or redirects
